post:
Is anyone interested to take over my Vultr account (idle VPS) that has plan with the following specs:

<pre><code>1GB @ $5/month - 20GB SSD - Tokyo @ 100GB BW - $70 credit left - 1 pending referral</code></pre>

The standard specs for $5/month is 768M RAM and 15 SSD. So you will save $2/month for 1GB plan but with only 100GB BW.

I just want it for $50 via Paypal. Vultr account data are changeable so I just update all of the data with yours.
